error.message: Call to deprecated function db_merge(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container and call merge() on it. For example,

Call to deprecated function db_select(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container and call select() on it. For example,

Call to deprecated function db_select(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container and call select() on it. For example,

Call to deprecated function db_delete(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container and call delete() on it. For example,

Declaration of Drupal\pathauto_i18n\Tests\Pathautoi18nNodeTest::createNode($language, $pathauto_i18n_status, $pathauto, $alias = false) should be compatible with Drupal\simpletest\WebTestBase::createNode(array $values = Array)

Call to deprecated function db_query_range(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container and call queryRange() on it. For example,

Class Drupal\pathauto_i18n\Tests\Pathautoi18nTestBase extends deprecated class Drupal\simpletest\WebTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, use \Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3030340. Replacement available from drupal:8.6.0.

Declaration of Drupal\pathauto_i18n\Tests\Pathautoi18nUserTest::createUser() should be compatible with Drupal\simpletest\WebTestBase::createUser(array $permissions = Array, $name = NULL, $admin = false, array $values = Array)
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to pathauto_i18n.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
